news.title: Welcome to All The Tools!
news.message: Thanks for signing up. Your account is ready — explore our growing library of tools for text, images, calculations, dates, and more. Everything is free to use and we're adding new tools regularly.

news.title: New Tool: On-Reward Scanner
news.message: We've just launched the On-Reward Scanner under OCR Tools. Upload a receipt image and the tool will automatically extract and tally your reward points — no manual counting needed.

news.title: Scheduled Maintenance — Feb 20
news.message: We'll be performing server maintenance on February 20th from 2:00–4:00 AM UTC. Some tools may be temporarily unavailable during this window. No data will be lost.

news.title: Profile & Account Page Launched
news.message: You can now manage your account preferences, view news and updates, and log out from a single place. We'll be adding more account features here over time.

news.title: Bug Fix: ASCII Character Reference
news.message: Fixed an issue where copying certain control characters from the ASCII grid would paste incorrect values in some browsers. All copy functions now work correctly across Chrome, Firefox, and Safari.

news.title: 3D Artist Spotlight — New Entries
news.message: We've added several new artists to the 3D Artist Spotlight section. Check out the latest featured creators and their work from across the community.
